about_the_game: This package adds nothing to the base game, but was created as an optional means of payment for fans who got the revamp for free and wanted to pay me anyway. As of right now, it only exists as an alternative to Paypal, since people are wary of it. I literally do not care if you ignore this.
detailed_description: This package adds nothing to the base game, but was created as an optional means of payment for fans who got the revamp for free and wanted to pay me anyway. As of right now, it only exists as an alternative to Paypal, since people are wary of it. I literally do not care if you ignore this.

You're welcome.
